subject: The Skinny: Wed., April 18, 2007
body:

Gunman A Mystery Even To 
Rommates
He's been described as a "loner" with few friends, but even his 
      dormitory mates say they knew little about Virginia Tech gunman Cho 
      Seung-Hui. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...
